name: Croissant
description: A flaky, buttery French pastry made from layered yeast-leavened dough, often eaten for breakfast,french

name: Coq au Vin
description: A classic French dish of chicken braised with red wine, mushrooms, onions, and herbs,french

name: Biryani
description: A fragrant Indian rice dish cooked with aromatic spices, basmati rice, and either chicken, mutton, or vegetables,India

name: Masala Dosa
description: A popular South Indian dish consisting of a crispy fermented rice-lentil crepe filled with spiced potato mixture,India
